items.content_html: Super Lightweight eCommerce Platform -- Built with AngularJS, PHP and Google Sheets API v3. The eCommerce platform's data is stored in Google Sheets. The product catalog, category management, and multi-lingual support are maintained using Google Sheets. Real-time data updates to the storefront.
items.title: VineGlobal/Super-Lightweight-eCommerce-Platform: Super Lightweight eCommerce Platform -- Built with AngularJS, PHP and Google Sheets API v3.  The eCommerce platform's data is stored in Google Sheets. The product catalog, category management, and multi-lingual support are maintained using Google Sheets. Real-time data updates to the storefront.
